title: Senior Software Developer
description: We are looking for a software engineer with experience in web development and knowledge of JavaScript, React and Node.js. The ideal candidate should be able to work in a team and have good communication skills.
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable software solutions
Mentor junior developers on the team
Perform code reviews and ensure quality
requirements: Mastery of JavaScript, React and Node.js
about: This position is ideal for a professional passionate about technology and software development, seeking a collaborative and challenging environment.

title: Data Analyst
description: We are looking for a data analyst with experience in handling large datasets and visualization tools. Knowledge of SQL, Python and R is required.
responsibilities: Extract and clean data from multiple sources
Identify trends and patterns in data
Collaborate with business teams on insights
requirements: Experience with visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI)
Knowledge of statistics and exploratory analysis
Ability to communicate insights to stakeholders
about: This role is perfect for those who enjoy working with data and seek to impact strategic decision-making.

title: Mobile Application Developer
description: We are looking for a mobile application developer with experience in iOS and/or Android. The candidate must have knowledge of Swift, Kotlin and user interface development.
responsibilities: Develop native applications for iOS and Android
Design intuitive and attractive user interfaces
Implement testing and debugging of applications
requirements: Experience in iOS development (Swift) or Android (Kotlin)
Familiarity with Git and version control
Ability to optimize performance and memory
about: This position is ideal for creatives who want to bring their ideas to life through innovative mobile applications.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We are looking for a DevOps engineer with experience in cloud infrastructure management, process automation and continuous integration tools. Knowledge of AWS, Azure or GCP is required.
requirements: Experience with AWS, Azure or GCP
Mastery of CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI)
Experience in Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
about: This role is perfect for those seeking to optimize processes and improve efficiency in development environments.

title: UX/UI Designer
description: We are looking for a UX/UI designer with a passion for creating exceptional digital experiences. Experience in Figma, user-centered design and collaboration with development teams is required.
requirements: Mastery of Figma and design tools
Experience in user research and testing
about: This position is ideal for those who want to impact user experience through intuitive and attractive design.

title: Database Administrator
description: A database administrator is sought with experience in PostgreSQL and MySQL. The candidate must ensure availability, security and performance of production databases.
about: This role is ideal for those who enjoy working with data and seek to ensure its integrity and performance.

title: Cybersecurity Specialist
description: We are looking for a cybersecurity specialist with knowledge of infrastructure protection, vulnerability analysis and incident response. Experience with SIEM and security certifications will be valued.
responsibilities: Perform vulnerability analysis and penetration testing
Monitor and respond to security incidents
Maintain SIEM systems and detection tools
Train teams on security best practices
requirements: Experience in penetration testing and vulnerability analysis
Knowledge of SIEM and detection tools
Knowledge of networks and operating systems
about: This position is ideal for those seeking to protect critical systems and data in a dynamic environment.

title: Product Manager
description: We are looking for a Product Manager with experience in defining and launching digital products. Analytical ability, leadership and knowledge of agile methodologies are required.
responsibilities: Collaborate with technical and marketing teams
requirements: Mastery of metrics and data analysis
about: This role is ideal for those who want to lead the development of innovative, user-centered products.

title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a frontend developer with experience in React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Knowledge of performance optimization and web accessibility will be valued.
requirements: Solid experience in React and JavaScript/TypeScript
Knowledge of CSS and Tailwind CSS
Experience in testing (Jest, React Testing Library)
about: This position is ideal for those seeking to create attractive and functional interfaces that improve user experience.

title: Backend Developer
description: We are looking for a backend developer with experience in Node.js, Express and NoSQL databases. Knowledge of microservices architecture is required.
responsibilities: Perform testing and debugging of applications
requirements: Familiarity with REST APIs and GraphQL
Knowledge of unit and integration testing
about: This role is ideal for those seeking to build robust and scalable backend solutions.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: We are looking for a machine learning engineer with experience in prediction models and data processing. Knowledge of TensorFlow, PyTorch and MLOps will be valued.
responsibilities: Develop and train machine learning models
Perform feature engineering and exploratory analysis
Collaborate on research of new techniques
requirements: Experience in Python and ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Familiarity with MLOps and model deployment
about: This position is ideal for those seeking to innovate in the field of machine learning and artificial intelligence.

title: QA Automation Engineer
description: A QA engineer is sought with experience in test automation using tools such as Selenium, Cypress or Playwright. Desired knowledge in CI/CD.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain automated test suites
Collaborate with developers on quality improvement
requirements: Experience in Selenium, Cypress or Playwright
Knowledge of manual and automated testing
about: This role is ideal for those seeking to ensure software quality through test automation.

title: Systems Administrator
description: We are looking for a systems administrator with experience in Linux, Docker and server monitoring. Knowledge of Bash or Python scripting will be a plus.
about: This position is ideal for those seeking to maintain technology infrastructure in optimal conditions.

title: Scrum Master
description: We are looking for a Scrum Master with experience in agile methodologies and multidisciplinary team management. Scrum Master certification is desirable.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in agile methodologies
Knowledge of management tools (Jira, Azure DevOps)
about: This role is ideal for those who want to guide teams toward excellence in agile product delivery.
